Headline: Guiding your journey to AI excellence. Founder at Firevision.uk | We turn any CCTV Camera into an AI Fire Detector | See Danger Sooner
Summary: Dynamic Technology Leader | Software Developer | Passionate Coach/Mentor I’m a self-starter and friendly professional with over 25+ years of expertise in software development, IT, project management, and leadership. With a proven record of success, I thrive in both independent and collaborative settings. I embrace challenges and take pride in coaching and mentoring individuals to achieve their full potential. Key Skills & Strengths Academic Excellence:   - Expert in marking academic assignments to ensure competency and quality.   - 100% success rate: Guided 350+ learners to complete their apprenticeship programs, with 99% achieving their goals on their first attempt. - Leadership & Coaching:   - Passionate about coaching individuals to excel, meet KPIs, and improve business objectives.   - Strong communication, mentoring, and leadership skills, backed by high resilience and a positive attitude.   - Experience mentoring teams toward timely and successful technical development milestones. - Software Development Expertise:   - Extensive experience across all stages of the SDLC, from development to operations.   - Skilled in Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, Scrumban, Waterfall).   - High-level troubleshooting, analytical problem-solving, and technical investigation skills. - Customer-Centric Focus:   - Proven ability to exceed expectations in high-pressure environments.   - Exceptional written and verbal communication skills at all organizational levels. - Versatility in Technology:   - Comfortable adapting to and mastering new technologies quickly.   - Expertise in creating bespoke solutions, such as a custom-built CRM application using web technologies. Key Achievements - Empowering Success:   - Successfully coached individuals to achieve their goals, transitioning into professional software developers. - Driving Business Impact:   - Consistently met KPIs and delivered results aligned with business objectives.   - Developed a streamlined process to enhance team productivity and communication. - Delivering Innovation:   - Designed and implemented a bespoke CRM application to improve efficiency.   - Provided tailored mentoring to colleagues and customers, enhancing team success. - Technical Mastery:   - Achieved swift case resolution through expert diagnosis and out-of-the-box problem-solving.   - Delivered exceptional responsiveness and productivity standards in Agile environments. With a passion for coaching and a customer-centric mindset, I am eager to bring value to new challenges. Let’s connect and discuss how I can help your team or business thrive!
